title: mRemoteNG frequently freezes when opening and closing Options
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
On mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3220:

1. File | Options and just click on OK button at the bottom.
2. Double click to open SSH session.
3. Close down connection and Yes button to confirm.
4. File | Options and problem appears. No options are displayed, only blank sheet.
5. Closing down empty Options and General panel and mRemoteNG freezes for some time.
6. Double click to open SSH session and close down the session.
7. File | Options and nothing happens.

Plenty of bugs... it looks AI is writing a lot o...
